verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yahweh!<s%> Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3050>Yahweh,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good,<s%> for his loving <S%H2896>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Who can <S%H4448>utter<s%> the mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> or fully <S%H8085>declare<s%> all his <S%H8416>praise?<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%> Blessed is one who <S%H6213>does<s%> what is <S%H6666>right<s%> at all <S%H6256>times.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, with the <S%H7522>favor<s%> that you show to your <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H6485>Visit<s%> me with your <S%H3444>salvation,<s%>

that I may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> of your <S%H972>chosen,<s%> that I may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of your <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that I may <S%H1984>glory<s%> with your <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers.<s%> We have committed <S%H5753>iniquity.<s%> We have done <S%H7561>wickedly.<s%>

Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7919>didn't<s%> understand your <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> They <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your loving <S%H2617>kindnesses,<s%> but were <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even at the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>
Nevertheless he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them for his <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H1369>sake,<s%> that he might make his mighty power <S%H3045>known.<s%>
He <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H2717>also,<s%> and it was dried up; so he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>depths,<s%> as through a <S%H4057>desert.<s%>
He <S%H3467>saved<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him who <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1350>them,<s%> and redeemed them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%> There was not <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H3498>left.<s%>
Then they <S%H539>believed<s%> his <S%H1697>words.<s%> They <S%H7891>sang<s%> his <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
They <S%H4116>soon<s%> <S%H7911>forgot<s%> his <S%H4639>works.<s%> They <S%H2442>didn't<s%> wait for his <S%H6098>counsel,<s%>
but <S%H8378>gave<s%> in to <S%H183>craving<s%> in the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> and <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H3452>wasteland.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them their <S%H7596>request,<s%> but <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7332>leanness<s%> into their <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
They <S%H7065>envied<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6918>saint.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> and swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H48>Abiram.<s%>
A <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H1197>kindled<s%> in their <S%H5712>company.<s%> The <S%H3852>flame<s%> burned <S%H3857>up<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> a molten <S%H4541>image.<s%>
Thus they <S%H4171>exchanged<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> for an <S%H8403>image<s%> of a <S%H7794>bull<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
They <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> their <S%H3467>Savior,<s%> who had <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>
Wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and awesome <S%H3372>things<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H4872>them,<s%> had Moses, his <S%H972>chosen,<s%> <S%H3884>not<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him in the <S%H6556>breach,<s%> to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> so that he <S%H7843>wouldn't<s%> destroy them.
<S%H3988>Yes,<s%> they despised the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> They <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe his <S%H1697>word,<s%>
but <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
Therefore he <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> them that he would <S%H5307>overthrow<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%>
that he would <S%H5307>overthrow<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them in the <S%H776>lands.<s%>
They <S%H6775>joined<s%> themselves also to <S%H1187>Baal<s%> <S%H398>Peor,<s%> and ate the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Thus they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%> The <S%H4046>plague<s%> broke in on <S%H6555>them.<s%>
Then <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> stood <S%H5975>up,<s%> and executed <S%H6419>judgment,<s%> so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stopped.<s%>
That was <S%H2803>credited<s%> to him for <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> for <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>come.<s%>
They <S%H7107>angered<s%> him also at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meribah,<s%> so that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was troubled for their <S%H3415>sakes;<s%>
because they were <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against his <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> he spoke <S%H981>rashly<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
They <S%H8045>didn't<s%> destroy the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> commanded <S%H559>them,<s%>
but <S%H6148>mixed<s%> themselves with the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H3925>learned<s%> their <S%H4639>works.<s%>
They <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H6091>idols,<s%> which became a snare to <S%H4170>them.<s%>
<S%H2076>Yes,<s%> they sacrificed their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H7700>demons.<s%>

They <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> even the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> whom they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to the <S%H6091>idols<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2610>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
Thus were they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> with their <S%H4639>works,<s%> and <S%H2181>prostituted<s%> themselves in their <S%H4639>deeds.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> with <S%H639>anger<s%> against his <S%H5971>people.<s%> He <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Those who <S%H8130>hated<s%> them ruled over <S%H4910>them.<s%>
Their <S%H341>enemies<s%> also <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> <S%H3665>them.<s%> They were brought into subjection under their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H4784>them,<s%> but they were rebellious in their <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and were brought <S%H4355>low<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
Nevertheless he <S%H7200>regarded<s%> their <S%H6862>distress,<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H7440>cry.<s%>
He <S%H2142>remembered<s%> for them his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H5162>repented<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his loving <S%H2617>kindnesses.<s%>
He <S%H5414>made<s%> them also to be <S%H7356>pitied<s%> <S%H6440>by<s%> all those who carried them <S%H7617>captive.<s%>

<S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H3068>us,<s%> Yahweh, our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> us from among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H7623>triumph<s%> in your <S%H8416>praise!<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> BOOK be V <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> even to <S%H5769>everlasting!<s%> Let all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen.<s%>" <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
